item.title: Speaking at Cloud Identity Summit 2017
item.description: I am excited to announce that I will be speaking at the Cloud Identity Summit 2017 in Chicago in June. I will discuss How Identity Management (Employee and Consumer) affects the bottom line. http://feeds.feedburner.com/IdentityLifecycleManagerilmBestPractices
